db:abstract.db:para: The Qt SVG module provides functionality for handling SVG images.

db:article.db:para: The Qt SVG module provides functionality for handling SVG images.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) is an XML-based language for describing two-dimensional vector graphics. Qt provides classes for rendering and displaying SVG drawings in widgets and on other paint devices. See the class descriptions for further details.
